title: How do I start a game after creating a file and downloading?
body: I've played 20 or so games. I've logged off and then back on. It wants me to download the game again to play?  I cant find the Play button I was using before.

replies.body: It kinda sounds like you might be doing the client update or downloading one of the patches. Usually you just need to wait for the download to finish up and then apply the patch, but if you're running into any errors you may need to double check your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) or make a few adjustments to your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure the patch works correctly.
